title: Vlad secondary resource colourblind issue.
body:
I'm colourblind (protanopia), so I play with colourblind mode on. For most things this works just fine, however I noticed when my friend was playing Vlad that his secondary resource bar is yellow when almost charged, and red when depleting, which makes it very hard for me to play around.

Here it is when almost fully charged
http://prntscr.com/bf04zf

And here it is when depleting
http://prntscr.com/bf069o

I would just like to make it so colourblind people, including me, can tell the difference between Vlad's two states. Maybe in a neutral blue or a darker red.
